thread.section_title: Thrift Books Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Thrift Books | www.thriftbooks.com
thread.title: Katie R
thread.title_full: Thrift Books reviewed by Katie R

author: Katie R
title: Katie R
text:
I love ThriftBooks! As a classroom teacher, it's tough to fill my classroom with engaging books for my students while on a budget. ThriftBooks helps me get these books my students love at a price that won't make me have to take up a second job! :)
My only two "wishes" are:
1. a more detailed tracking method for packages. I would love to have an "anticipated date of delivery" for the books I order.
2. The coupons for reaching Reading Rewards had a longer time to be used. If I order books to meet my Reading Rewards, I have to place another order by the end of the next day to use the coupon. If I make an order, chances are I won't be placing another order until the following week.
